headline: Progressive (PGR) Is Considered a Good Investment by Brokers: Is That True?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Progressive (PGR) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: Buy 5 S&P 500 Stocks Flying High Amid Index's Prevailing Volatility
summary: Defying the bloodbath a handful of S&P 500 stocks have provided double-digit returns year to date. Five of them are AWK, EXC, CNP, PGR, BRO.
